response.overview: In the winter of 1982, a twelve-man research team at a remote Antarctic research station discovers an alien buried in the snow for over 100,000 years. Soon unfrozen, the form-changing creature wreaks havoc, creates terror... and becomes one of them.
response.tagline: Man is the warmest place to hide.
response.title: The Thing

titles.title: La cosa (El enigma de otro mundo)
